Project Repository

Explore our comprehensive collection of student-led engineering projects, from concept to implementation.

Constructed Wetland Model

CEE 400

Capstone Design: Lab-scale Model for Wetlands

This capstone project involves the design and construction of a lab-scale wetland model, demonstrating innovative approaches to water treatment and sustainable environmental engineering.

Bridge Design

ENGR 210

Engineering Statics

A practical application of engineering statics, this project focuses on the design, construction, and rigorous testing of a scaled bridge, showcasing structural integrity principles.

Water Quality Monitoring

CEE 318

Environmental Water Quality

Through hands-on field measurements and laboratory analysis, this project assesses the overall health and quality of a natural water body.

Sustainable Building Materials

CEE 350

Construction Materials

Investigation of eco-friendly building materials and their applications in modern construction practices.

Solar Energy Integration

ENGR 320

Renewable Energy Systems

Design and implementation of solar energy systems for residential and commercial applications.

Wastewater Treatment

CEE 415

Water Treatment Design

Advanced wastewater treatment system design incorporating biological and chemical processes.

Living Engineering Laboratory

Transforming engineering education through hands-on learning and open educational resources.
